title: The One With Sam Jay
description:
Bob and Monét are live from Las Vegas at the Life Is Beautiful festival with special guest comedian, Sam Jay! Tune in to hear how Sam Jay became a writer for SNL, the difference between coming up in comedy versus coming up in the drag scene, and hear all 3 of them answer juicy fan questions!

This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Sibling Rivalry listeners get 10% off their first month at betterhelp.com/RIVALRY

This podcast is sponsored by Raycon and Sibling Rivalry listeners can get 15% off their Raycon order at BuyRaycon.com/RIVALRY.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
